title: Unify - The collective human species receive a potent mega dose of healing medicine through a great number of bodies on this particular World Spirit Day. This healing and collective prayer will help us transition through this chapter of our journey.  Join our global meditation/prayer/ceremony. The Solstice is happening at 2:02 am PST - So we are opening up this portal 12/20 at 9 AM PST - 12/21 9 AM PST. Please join us! #worldspiritday #globalmeditation #solstice2020 #solstice #wintersolstice #meditation #prayer #ceremony | Facebook
